meanings.definition: The outer surface of a building's roof.
meanings.sent1: From the rooftop, I could see the whole city below.
meanings.sent2: Let's have a picnic on the rooftop this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The rooftop was so windy, my hat flew away!
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared high like kites on the rooftop of her mind.
meanings.sent5: The rooftop glowed under the setting sun, painting the sky in warm hues.

meanings.definition: A flat, elevated surface on top of a building.
meanings.sent1: The rooftop of the skyscraper offered a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent2: The rooftop garden is a peaceful oasis in the bustling city.
meanings.sent3: The rooftop party was a hit, with music and laughter filling the air.
meanings.sent4: On the rooftop of success, he felt invincible against any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The rooftop terrace was adorned with twinkling lights, creating a magical atmosphere.
